hotkeys.name: Selects the entire sound
Pastes the clipboard into the sound at the beginning
Copies the selection into the clipboard
Displays the Crossfade window. Crossfades the clipboard with the selection
Pastes the clipboard into the sound at the end
Pastes the clipboard into the sound at the finish marker's position
Displays a window to set the playback marker's location to a specific time
Starts playback relative to the mouse's horizontal position in the waveform
Rewinds from the current playback marker's position
Plays from the current playback marker's position
Fast forwards from the current playback marker's position
Makes the playback speed slower
Playback at normal speed
Makes the playback speed faster
Jumps the start marker to the next cue point
Jumps the start marker to the previous cue point
Jumps the finish marker to the next cue point
Jumps the finish marker to the previous cue point
Overwrites the selection with the clipboard
Displays the Mix window. Mixes the clipboard with the sound at the start marker's position
Displays the Mix window. Mixes the clipboard with the sound at the start marker's position
Creates a new sound
Opens a sound
Pastes the clipboard into a new Sound window
Drops a new cue point at the start marker position
Drops a new cue point at the finish marker position
Drops a new cue point at the current recording, playback, or start marker position
Drops a new cue point at the current recording, playback, or start marker position and displays the edit window
Replaces the selection with the clipboard contents
Saves the file
Trims the sound. Removes all audio outside the selection
Displays the Trim Silence window. Removes leading and trailing silences at the beginning and end of the selection
Pastes the clipboard into the sound at the start marker's position
Sets the select to the view
Cuts the selection and copies it into the clipboard
Redo. Reverses last undo
Undoes last change
Selects both channels of a stereo file
Toggles the selection to the left channel
Toggles the selection to the right channel
Zooms 10:1 horizontally
Zooms 1:1 horizontally
Views 1 second horizontally
Views 10 seconds horizontally
Views 1 minute horizontally
Views 1 hour horizontally
Horizontally zooms all the way out
Displays the Set Selection window
Stores the locations of the start and finish markers
Zooms to previous horizontal zoom
Moves the start and finish markers to the stored locations
Horizontally zooms in on the selection
Horizontally zooms to the user defined level
Vertically zooms all the way out
Displays window to specify horizontal zoom
Deletes the selection permanently
Moves the start marker to the current playback position
Moves the finish marker to the current playback position
Plays some audio up to the start marker
Plays three seconds of audio up to the finish marker
Plays from the start marker to the finish marker
Plays from the finish marker to the end
Moves the selection to its previous range
Scrolls the Sound window view left
Scrolls the Sound window view right
Scrolls the Sound window view left one page
Scrolls the Sound window view right one page
Moves the Sound window view to the start marker's position
Moves the Sound window view to the finish marker's position
Moves the Sound window view to the beginning of the sound
Moves the Sound window view to the end of the sound
Moves the start marker to the beginning of the sound
Moves the start marker to the finish marker's position
Moves the finish marker to the start marker's position
Moves the finish marker to the end of the sound
Moves the start marker left
Moves the start marker right
Moves the finish marker left
Moves the finish marker right
Horizontally zooms in
Horizontally zooms out
Vertically zooms in
Vertically zooms out
Plays or stops a sound (toggles playback)
Plays 1
Plays 2
Plays 3
Rewinds
Fast forwards
Pauses
Stops
Starts recording
Stops recording
Pauses recording
Displays Device Controls Properties window
Starts help
Closes the Sound window
Switches between Main window and Device Controls window
Switches between Sound windows
